article.title: Northrop Grumman Awarded Army Knowledge Online Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Information Technology Inc., McLean, Va., is being awarded a time-and-materials contract with a maximum amount of $24,597,416 for operation and maintenance services in support of Army Knowledge Online—Enterprise Services. The Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, N.J., is the contracting activity.
